The heavy rainfall may produce flooding along creeks and rivers and in urban, poor drainage and low lying areas.

entry.summary: ...SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS THROUGH SUNDAY WITH A RISK OF LOCALIZED FLOODING... Periods of moderate to heavy rain associated with showers and thunderstorms will continue through Sunday over portions of central and eastern Washington and eastern Oregon. entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...GUSTY WINDS THIS EVENING... A lingering outflow boundary moving southeast will produce a wind shift from west to northwest and gusts of 25 to 35 mph this evening. A few showers may accompany the gusty winds. Persons with outdoor plans should be prepared to seek shelter inside when the gusty winds approach.
